subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another weird device

I get lots of answers and ideas through dreams--My biggest problem is that =
I don't REMEMBER my dreams very well.  This is cute, like a boxful of confe=
tti or gummi worms.  Good luck with it Mike!  BTW, I got the radio from you=
 hacked last night and it actually WORKS!!  I'm on the road and will try it=
 out in the motel tonight.  THANKS!!!

Robin


  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: M.A. Coletta (Mike)<mailto:michaelcoletta@...> 
  To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Sunday, Janua=
ry 20, 2008 10:36 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Another weird device


  You know=
 me and my weird devices... yes I've built another.
  This one came to me i=
n a dream last night. I think it was because some 
  of you guys were talki=
ng about echo chambers.
  Anyway... when I woke up I went looking around th=
e house for stuff to 
  make this thing before I forgot what it looked like=
 in my dream.
  I completed it but now I guess I must test it to see if it =
is what I 
  think it is... an EVP Box, maybe???

  Read more and see a few=
 pictures, here: http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=3D200<http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=
=3D200>

  - Mike
